channel.title: Need Help Missing Run.bat
channel.description:
okay on every server i download after i extract there is no Run.bat file. on one of the ones i downloaded i successfully made one by using this coding:
@echo off cd Client Files start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
however this only worked on the one server and wont work on any others. i am running windows 7 Os.
i also tried this on another server : @echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause
that didnt work either. when i try to run the run.bat i made after putting in those codes i often get "could not find main class Gui" program will exit. and stuff like that,
please help me, what should i do?

item.title: Need Help Missing Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

nope

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Missing Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

iGODWARS:

“could not find main class Gui” program will exit.

It means that the file gui.java isn’t there. Make sure it has one. If it doesn’t have one use one of the two.

@echo off
title Your server
start javaw -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

If that dint worked too, try this. The following works in Windows 7 and Linux.

@echo off
title Your Client
"C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Missing Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @iGODWARS iGODWARS
item.description:
@iGODWARS wrote:

okay on every server i download after i extract there is no Run.bat file.
on one of the ones i downloaded i successfully made one by using this coding:

@echo off
cd Client Files
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

however this only worked on the one server and wont work on any others.
i am running windows 7 Os.

i also tried this on another server :
@echo off
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

that didnt work either. when i try to run the run.bat i made after putting in those codes i often get “could not find main class Gui” program will exit.
and stuff like that,

please help me, what should i do?

Read full topic
